data.text: @HSELive How many people caught covid from the vaccine and died? How many? Funny how the spike in infections around the world go up on every vaccine roll out.... https://t.co/gAbSxX1uLD

@HSELive #1 Get It
#2 get over it
Or:
#1 get the Jab, 3 Boosters
#2 get It Anyway
#3 Get Over It. 

"Slowing the Spread" has done nothing but Amplify It! 250000 deaths in year one. 5,750,000 more since January 20, 2021? The Only Facts you need right there!

@HSELive People may have to co-exist with Covid eventually. app Bost makes it safe and easy to communicate with users nearby. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/lbYFuhGh3a
